text: it is truly my honor and privilege to
welcome you all to the dedication of the
root Mulan Chiu Chow Center I think the
Chow Center will foster in new ways one
of the elements that has defined how a
business school for its entire history
its unique residential learning
experience from the hub to the terrace
from the classrooms to the dining halls
and from the lounges to the
multi-purpose rooms it will not simply
be a space but a building with a true
sense of place and purpose the Ruth
Mulan Chiu Chow Center will welcome more
than 10,000 executive education
participants each year they will have
the best opportunity for exchange with
one another and with a Business School
community that is more cosmopolitan than
our predecessors could have imagined it
is clear that the Chow family has a deep
appreciation for the importance of
education in shaping the leaders of this
world and so this Center is a fitting
tribute to the matriarch of such an
impressive family my mother was the
constant North the constant North Star
of our family she was a strong
foundation that gave us a confidence and
the courage to advance in this new
country we hope my mother's example a
remaining steadfast in the face of
adversity and turmoil will inspire
others to never give up their dreams the
Chou story resonates and inspires us
because it is a uniquely American
experience told through a
special family as we open the doors
today of the child Center
II know this is PC will be a vibrant hub
of learning the connectedness across
cultures
you
